body: i'm thankful that despite not being our best selves, d and i didn't murder each other yesterday, the last day before we move. i'm thankful we got the keys to the new place and i got to see the inside for the first time. i'm thankful that somehow at the end of the day today we will have finished moving.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful that despite not being our best selves, d and i didn't murder each other yesterday, the last day before we move. i'm thankful we got the keys to the new place and i got to see the inside for the first time. i'm thankful that somehow at the end of the day today we will have finished moving.
